sentences.en: A look of disbelief came into his eyes, but was quickly replaced by one of dismal surrender.
sentences.cn: 他眼里闪现出一丝怀疑，但又马上代之以可怜无助的依从。

sentences.en: Gallagher varied between panic and disbelief.
sentences.cn: 加拉赫时而惶惶不安,时而又疑惑不定.

sentences.en: He declared his total disbelief in psychic phenomena.
sentences.cn: 他宣称自己完全不相信鬼魂现象。

sentences.en: He listened in disbelief to this extraordinary story.
sentences.cn: 他满腹疑惑地听着这个离奇的故事.

sentences.en: He listened to my story with an air of growing disbelief.
sentences.cn: 他带着十分怀疑的神情听着我的故事.

sentences.en: He looked me up and down in disbelief.
sentences.cn: 他以怀疑的眼光上下打量我.

sentences.en: He stared at me in disbelief .
In disbelief I shot my eyes toward Mom for support.
sentences.cn: 狐疑中我向母亲递眼色,求她帮忙.

sentences.en: It left us reeling with disbelief.
sentences.cn: 它让我们感到心烦意乱，难以置信。

sentences.en: It's natural to react with disbelief if your child is accused of bullying.
sentences.cn: 如果你的孩子被指责欺负了别的孩子，你不相信是很正常的。

sentences.en: She gazed at me in disbelief when I told her the news.
sentences.cn: 我告诉她这消息时,她以怀疑的目光注视着我.

sentences.en: She looked at him in disbelief.
Tamara stared at him in disbelief, shaking her head.
sentences.cn: 塔玛拉一边狐疑地盯着他看，一边摇着头。

sentences.en: The film version requires greater suspension of disbelief than the book.
sentences.cn: 与原书比起来,电影版需要带给观众更多的悬念.

sentences.en: The reaction to the murders was one of shock and disbelief.
sentences.cn: 人们对这些谋杀事件的反应是震惊和不敢相信。

sentences.en: We were amazed, shocked, dumbfounded, shaking our heads in disbelief.
sentences.cn: 我们震惊、愕然、目瞪口呆，难以置信地摇着头。

trans.tran_en: a feeling that something is not true or does not exist
